source: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_SEQ_00<tab>Word is that Guolgeim seeks an extra pair of hands.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_SEQ_00<tab>レヴナンツトールのグオルゲイムには、運んでほしいものがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_SEQ_01<tab>Guolgeim bids you salvage whatever usable provisions still remain at a ruined camp nearby. Open the crates with a sledgehammer and collect the boxes of abandoned supplies.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_SEQ_01<tab>「崩壊したキャンプ」の物資をレヴナンツトールへ運ぶことが、グオルゲイムの仕事らしい。「崩壊したキャンプ」の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8D2001 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87E401 /var>」を使い、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877601 /var>」を集めよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_SEQ_02<tab>The area yields three boxes of supplies, none the worse for wear even after five years. Perhaps Guolgeim will tell you more when you deliver the haul.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877601 /var>を集めることができた。レヴナンツトールへ戻り「グオルゲイム」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877601 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_SEQ_03<tab>After taking hold of the supplies, Guolgeim reveals to you her reluctance to visit the ruined Camp Revenant's Toll. It does one no good to pick through the detritus of a place that was dear to the heart...
target: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_SEQ_03<tab>レヴナンツトールの起こりには、悲しい事故があったらしい。とてもつかれている様子のグオルゲイム。彼女は大丈夫なのだろうか……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_TODO_00<tab>Open the crates with a sledgehammer.
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_TODO_01<tab>Give the boxes of supplies to Guolgeim.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_TODO_01<tab>グオルゲイムに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877601 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_000<tab>There's a ruined camp to the west of here. You know the place?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_000<tab>ここから西に行ったところに、
「崩壊したキャンプ」があるんだが、知ってるかい？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_001<tab>What I do is recover what I can from the site and bring it back here. The gil's good and the work is plentiful, but...I'm feeling a bit done in, to tell the truth.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_001<tab>そのキャンプ跡から荷物を回収し、
ここまで持ち帰るのが、今のあたしの仕事でね。
でも……ちょっと最近つかれてきちまってさ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_002<tab>I could use a little help, if you're looking for some honest work. Use this sledgehammer to break the locks on the crates, and bring back a few of the boxes inside─say, three.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_002<tab>悪いんだけど、手を貸してくれないかい？
この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87E401 /var>」で「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8D2001 /var>」をこじ開けて、
中身を運んできてくれ。3つほどで十分さ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You obtain a box of abandoned supplies.

target: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_DUMMY_000_010<tab>崩壊キャンプの巨大な木箱にバールを使用

source: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_020<tab>You find the crates? Good, good. Let's have what you found inside.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_020<tab>ああ、あんたか。
ちゃんと集めてこれたかい？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_030<tab>I ought to be ashamed of myself for hiring another to do my own job, but...there's no cozening myself─it makes me heartsore to go there. The Calamity made it thus.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_030<tab>悪かったね、こんな雑用を頼んじまって。
でもねえ、あのキャンプ跡へ行くたび……つかれてさ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_031<tab>In case you didn't already know, that was Camp Revenant's Toll, a hub for 'venturers. Many a merry day and night I've spent there. 'Twas my abode at the crossroads.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_031<tab>霊災で落ちてきた火の玉のせいで、あんなになったけど、
あそこは、もともとちゃんとした冒険者ギルドの拠点で
「キャンプ・レヴナンツトール」と呼ばれていたんだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_032<tab>Never paid much mind to the name of these parts until the Calamity, but...Revenant's Toll. Not exactly a lucky sort of name.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_032<tab>そう、ここと同じ名前。
「レヴナンツトール」……亡者の弔鐘だなんて、
不吉な地名が、不幸を呼びこんじまったのかねぇ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_033<tab>I wish to the Twelve that they had changed it to something else when they built this new camp.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_033<tab>この新しい拠点が、あのキャンプ跡みたいな不幸に
見舞われないよう祈るばかりだよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_034<tab>It wearies me, is all...going there and sorting through the mess. Sometimes, I come across something I know well, and I... <sigh> It weighs on my heart.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_034<tab>それにしても……
本当につかれるんだよねぇ、あのキャンプ跡に行くと。
……つかれてたまらないんだよ。
